entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
